title: Narumiya International
text:
Narumiya International (<a href="Japanese%20language">jp</a>: 株式会社ナルミヤ・インターナショナル) is a Japanese <a href="Joint-stock%20company">company limited</a> headquartered in <a href="Minato%2C%20Tokyo">Minato Ward</a>, <a href="Tokyo">Tokyo</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. The firm manufactures and distributes <a href="Textile%20industry">textiles</a> and specializes in <a href="children%27s%20clothing">children's clothing</a>.
Overview.
As of 2005, the company operated 896 stores globally. The company focuses on the manufacture, processing and sale of childrenʼs clothing and accessories for existing brands under license and for the company's own set of in house brands. In 2007, <a href="SBI%20Group">SBI Holdings</a> took a majority stake in the company. In August 2016, it was announced that Japan Industrial Partners was to acquire Nuramiya for an undisclosed amount.
